reviews.comment: Golfed 9 holes in these and they were great! No breaking in needed. Would recommend. I’d also recommend going 1/2 size up!

reviews.name: constancef426035023
reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
reviews.comment: These shoes were a gift and unfortunately I was unable to use them prior to the 30 day guarantee. The first outing was rough as my feet were soaked by the end of the round. If you are a golfer who plays in a variety of weather conditions, I would definitely recommend a different shoe. Playing on days that the course is wet is horrible, my feet get uncomfortable very quickly.

shoes.name: NikeCourt React Vapor NXT
shoes.description: For the rally that won’t relent or the dangling volley that needs to be smashed at the net, go with the next generation of tennis performance. Backed by years of athlete data, it provides the kind of tenacious traction that can help you get to that unreachable ball along the baseline. An innovative cushioning system offers the sort of satisfying support that can help make the difference if your match goes the distance.

productDetail.title: LOOK FAST. PLAY FAST.
productDetail.description: For the rally that won’t relent or the dangling volley that needs to be smashed at the net, go with the next generation of tennis performance. Backed by years of athlete data, it provides the kind of tenacious traction that can help you get to that unreachable ball along the baseline. An innovative cushioning system offers the sort of satisfying support that can help make the difference if your match goes the distance.
benefits:
Closer to the Ground
Nike React technology delivers an extremely smooth ride. Placed near your arch, the soft foam works in tandem with a firmer foam along the outside of your foot. This alignment is designed to help you push off during fast movements.

Data-Informed Durability
Built to withstand the force of sliding, the generative design uses data to integrate durable rubber and tough plastic in high-wear areas, like the medial side of the forefoot.

Innovative Grip
The modified herringbone outsole uses athlete data to provide grip without impacting your ability to slide.
Stiff frame on the lateral side creates an extra-stable feel during side-to-side movements.
Full-length inner sleeve creates a snug, sock-like fit.
details: Designed for wear on hard court surfaces

reviews.name: FootballWife
reviews.title: Heavy. Bulky. Weird.
reviews.comment: I tried these in two different sizes and they are an odd shoe for tennis. I tried them on and did some movements in my house and immediately knew these were not for me on court. I sprint and run a lot and could see myself tripping over my feet with these shoes. I just don't know why you don't stick with the thing that works. The Court Zoom Vapor 9.5 and the Vapor X were superior court shoes and you haven't made anything that comes close since.

reviews.name: JeehyeK777627578
reviews.title: Comfortable!
reviews.comment: I usually find Nike tennis shoes to be too stiff and narrow, but these are great. They are lighter and more flexible than the typical tennis shoes but still feel snug and secure. I have wide feet and low arches and have a hard time finding court shoes that don't hurt my feet after an hour--I have been able to wear these without any pain at all. I like them so much that I purchased a second pair so that I don't have to look for shoes again next season. They do run quite big and I ordered a whole size down. I usually wear size 7 in Nike running shoes, but I found the 6 to be the correct size for me in these shoes. If you have wide feet and prefer lower arch support, I would recommend them.

reviews.name: Maureen
reviews.title: So pretty but just a smidge too narrow for me
reviews.comment: Loved everything about these shoes except they were just a smidge too narrow for me. I wasn't sure if they would stretch with wear because they have that rubber encasing it, so I am reluctantly returning them.

shoes.name: NikeCourt Air Max Volley
shoes.description: Tennis is a dynamic, fast-paced sport. Designed to contour a woman's foot, the NikeCourt Air Max Volley has a sleek profile that will keep your feet comfortable and locked down, so you can focus on getting to the ball quickly.

productDetail.title: SPEED AND SUPPORT.
productDetail.description: Tennis is a dynamic, fast-paced sport. Designed to contour a woman's foot, the NikeCourt Air Max Volley has a sleek profile that will keep your feet comfortable and locked down, so you can focus on getting to the ball quickly.
benefits:
Adaptive Fit
The laces intertwine with reinforced loops, so the more you cinch down the laces, the more support you'll get around the midfoot.

Cushioned Comfort
A visible Max Air unit in the heel helps absorb impact during fast cuts and quick movements. A drop-in foam insole cushions every step and creates a sleek, low-profile look and feel.

Inspiration in Motion
The arcing lines of the shoe mimic the contour of a tennis volley. Below the arc, the details scream breathability and lightness; above it, the features focus on durability and stability.

Female-Specific Design
With a design based on women’s foot morphology, this shoe has a shallower toe box, a tapered heel, a higher arch and an outsole that narrows through the arch. You'll even get data-driven durability exactly where you need it the most.
details: Foam pods on the heel create a comfortable, secure fit.
Generative design uses data to place extra traction along the perimeter of the outsole for grip precisely where you need it the most.
Ergonomic heel design supports the rocking nature of a tennis serve and strike.

reviews.name: Samantha J.
reviews.title: Needs longer laces
reviews.comment: Shoes fit well and comfy but the laces are way too short and barely tie bow. Had to purchase longer laces.

reviews.name: Jodi N
reviews.title: Show stopper
reviews.comment: Great look, comfortable if you don’t have wide feet. Would be great if insole was a memory foam sole. Does not feel light weight but it’s definitely a show stopper. Looks great with my scrubs.

reviews.name: Celestial Sky
reviews.title: Nike Women's Air Max Tennis Shoes
reviews.comment: Love these! They are heavier than a running shoe, but they are so pretty that I decided to keep them.

shoes.name: Nike Flex Runner 2
shoes.description: Running shoes made easy! The Nike Flex Runner 2 is built for the kid on the go who loves to play all day—from gym class to a sprint down the block. They're lace-free, meaning super quick to slip on and off. Who’s ready to race?

productDetail.title: A SLIP-ON FOR SPEEDSTERS.
productDetail.description: Running shoes made easy! The Nike Flex Runner 2 is built for the kid on the go who loves to play all day—from gym class to a sprint down the block. They're lace-free, meaning super quick to slip on and off. Who’s ready to race?
benefits:
Easy On, Easy Fit
A stretchy bootie design makes it easy to slip your foot in with a snug and secure feel. A heel strap and leather on the sides stabilize your fit.

Fast Steps
The flexible foam sole is designed with deep grooves so every step and stride feels secure while running. The sole’s pattern also helps with multi-surface traction.

Steady Feel
The back of the shoe features foam that creates a wing-like shape around the heel for extra stability when moving in different directions.
details: Breathable fabric on the front of the shoe is lightweight and helps keep feet cool.
The toe tip is reinforced for extra durability for toe-draggers.
Pull tabs on the heel and tongue help you take the shoe on and off.

reviews.name: DanB128153538
reviews.title: after 2 times wearing
reviews.comment: well after 2 times wearing these shoes my son had to have..... they rip and than i get one mad 9 yr old.... what the heck this isnt right!!!!!

reviews.name: MelanieT
reviews.title: Fantastic Shoes! Easy On & Off
reviews.comment: Fantastic shoes for kiddos that have issues with laces and/or fine motor skills. My son is on the autism spectrum and is very picky about shoes and he loves these. He can get them on and off all by himself and he has a new sense of accomplishment with these. I highly recommend these and I’ve already bought a second pair. He also receives so many compliments on the Blue/red/yellow colorway.

reviews.title: Cute and comfy
reviews.comment: So comfortable and light weight , I didn’t even think there was anything in the box! And true to size

shoes.name: Nike Air Zoom Crossover
shoes.description: Our first basketball shoe inspired by ladies of the league is made for ALL young hoopers to dominate their game. The Nike Air Zoom Crossover, named after a favorite move, brings an extra bounce to your step with Zoom Air while you fly sky high on the court.

productDetail.title: CHANGING THE FUTURE OF THE GAME.
productDetail.description: Our first basketball shoe inspired by ladies of the league is made for ALL young hoopers to dominate their game. The Nike Air Zoom Crossover, named after a favorite move, brings an extra bounce to your step with Zoom Air while you fly sky high on the court.
benefits:
By Her, For All
The rubber outsole pattern is inspired by tracking of weather patterns—meant to simulate the storm of the growing youth and women’s game. Graphics and design details tie back to Nike’s Swoosh Fly collection—our signature apparel line for women’s basketball.

All About Air
A Zoom Air unit in the heel provides responsive cushioning for an extra bouncy feel.

Cool Moves
Lightweight mesh provides breathability so your feet stay cool and comfortable on the court.
details: The toe area is designed to give plenty of room for growing feet.
The collar fits snug around the ankle for support.
Grooves in the sole provide flexibility so each step feels natural.

reviews.name: Got2Bcomfy
reviews.title: Quality shoes ready for adventure
reviews.comment: I’m an adult with small feet, so I’m lucky to be able to fit in kids’ shoes. This pair is perfect! They’re stylish and comfy for every activity, from a shopping trip to a day at the park. I’m a women’s 6.5-7, and I usually wear a kids’ 4.5-5. Size 4.5 seems plenty spacious for me, so if you’re in between sizes then I’d select the smaller option. I’m very impressed with the quality of these shoes. I can’t wait to wear them on some more adventures!

reviews.name: Tanya_Saree
reviews.title: Stylish and comfy basketball shoes
reviews.comment: My son is constantly on his feet and needed a shoe that could keep up with him. He plays basketball, skateboards, and cycles. He has worn these shoes for all of his regular activities. He has told me they are extra comfy and loves the cool look of the shoe. My son is tall for his age, he wears a 6.5Y and has no problem getting these shoes on himself. I really like how durable the shoe is, they have been worn nonstop for 2 weeks and still look great. He has noticed a few details that really make these shoes special such as game mode on the front by the laces and fly on a small tag on the back of the shoe.

reviews.name: Keithw76
reviews.title: Comfortable shoes for picky feet
reviews.comment: My son is very picky about the shoes he wears on his feet. Not only do they have to be comfortable but they have to be the perfect size. We have found that with this shoe. It’s lightweight, durable, and aesthetically appealing. He has been wanting a pair of basketball shoes for a very long time. Now he just needs the same shoe in other colors!

shoes.name: Giannis Immortality 2
shoes.description: All little hoopers want playtime to last forever. The Giannis Immortality 2 helps make that happen. Rocking a new-and-improved strap for comfort (stamped with Giannis’ logo) and a lightweight feel, these shoes make sure the fun never stops.

productDetail.description: All little hoopers want playtime to last forever. The Giannis Immortality 2 helps make that happen. Rocking a new-and-improved strap for comfort (stamped with Giannis’ logo) and a lightweight feel, these shoes make sure the fun never stops.
benefits:
Innovative Strap
Hook-and-loop strap is soft and flexible. An integrated pull cord makes it easier to pull these on and off.

Ground Control
Rubber sole with herringbone pattern gives durable traction. Grooves are added to make the shoes extra flexible.

Built to Last
Breathable mesh is lightweight so little feet can feel comfy all day. An extra skin layer across the toes gives durability, and a plush collar adds comfort.
details: See-through Swoosh logo lets you take a peek inside to see the elastic laces at work.

shoes.description: The Jordan 4 Retro is inspired by the original AJ4. Made with real and synthetic leather and textile, soft foam cushioning, and play-ready rubber traction, it features the mesh paneling and angled overlays that made the shoe so memorable.

benefits:
Luxe Look and Feel

Secure Fit
Angular overlays along the sides connect to the upper lace feeds, so when you lace up, the overlays wrap over your foot to secure the fit.

Instant Recognition

reviews.comment: Easy enough to get on and off that my toddler can do it, light and airy for hot summer days, keeps his toes covered so he doesn’t stub them, holding up so well to nonstop play, and wipe down to clean easily

shoes.name: Nike Kawa SE
shoes.description: The Nike Kawa SE is an easy slip-on for any kiddo. Straps keep little feet from doing the kick-off dance. With plush comfort and a shiny logo, it’s all about looking and feeling good.

reviews.title: Nice Shoe But Runs Small
reviews.comment: The sandal is very cute and durable for a toddler but runs really small. I ordered it for an 18month old who wears a 6c and returned it twice already to get a better fit. I just ordered a 9c and that should fit perfectly. He's ok with the other Nike shoes he's been wearing. This is actually the first sandal that he's allowed anyone to put close to his feet because it's not made with a hard plastic.

shoes.name: LITE RACER ADAPT 5.0 SHOES
shoes.description: These adidas shoes are the quickest way to step outside without losing style points. With their unexpected color combinations and sporty webbed laces, they instantly add flash to simple outfits. The Cloudfoam cushioning feels superlight and comfy, whether you style them up with denim or slip them on with swim shorts.

reviews.title: Good stuff

Add in their running inspiration and you have a foundation that's build on comfort. Specifically, Adiprene cushioning. In every detail, these don't hold back.

reviews.title: Very Comfortable at a great price
reviews.comment: These are extremely comfortable shoes and they are very lightweight. I have the Boost 2k and these Ozelias are much lighter. Yet they feel sturdy and not cheap in quality. The stitching is very well done and only a couple of tiny areas where you can see an overlap of glue or a stray stitch but you really have to look closely. Overall these are definitely nice for the price. Basically better looking Yeezy 500 on a budget. They run a bit large so you might want to order a half size down.

shoes.description: These Ultraboost running shoes serve up comfort and responsiveness. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole for endless energy, with a Linear Energy Push system and a Continental™ Rubber outsole. This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic —  reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.

reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
reviews.comment: My pair had excess glue marks and glue stains all around the sole. Considering the price of this pair, I expected better quality control.

reviews.title: Dissapointed
reviews.comment: Quality, design, weight all ok.. Its adidas, but it '' burned'' my leg in the inside before the big finger on the side. Its like they are opening your skin as you ran. Maybe its the size of my foot? I dont know. It is frustrating. Please take consider for your labs for the next models.

reviews.title: The best shoes my feet have experienced.
reviews.comment: I bought these shoes when they were on sale based on a recommendation from a college roommate. Wow! These shoes are amazing! They are so comfortable. If you like walking on clouds and having a plushy ride with a little pep in your step then these are the shoes for you! I bought them in white so they could go with anything I wore. These are great for running and for lifestyle/fashion. If you want a comfy work shoe I would recommend the all-black version as I try and keep my white shoes looking like the shoes angels might wear if they were to grace the earth which is a chore. Additionally, the all-black at this time is only $119 which is a steal in my opinion. Hopefully, the shoes last. I am really impressed by the rubber outsole made with Continental. As I runner, I picked up on the quality and expect the outsole to last for a long time. The collar of the shoe is a bit odd in the back it is at a 60-70° angle. I will try and update this later to see how the shoes hold up. Warning: Not suitable for asceticism. Note: This shoe provides a pleasurable experience. Warning: Your feet may fall in love with you as a result of your purchase!

shoes.name: ULTRABOOST 5.0 DNA SHOES
shoes.description: These adidas sneakers are living their best life. Rooted in running but with one foot (pardon the pun) firmly in the realm of fashion, the Ultraboost DNA is built for whatever your day brings. adidas PRIMEKNIT wraps the foot for a supportive fit. BOOST provides instant comfort and endless energy return for a smooth ride no matter where they take you.

reviews.title: Great shoe, but not durable
reviews.comment: There are multiple holes on the fronts of each shoe and the bottom heel part doesn't stick anymore so it hangs out. And the sole of the left shoe doesn't stick anymore so that shoe is lopsided. Really nice shoe, just wasn't that durable given the amount of time I had them. If I can get store credit, I'd still buy another adidas shoe

reviews.title: Fit changes… shoes too tight around top of foot.
reviews.comment: Disappointed with these ultraboosts. I’ve worn ultraboosts before and they were always the perfect fit and comfort. They are too tight around the top of the foot. It’s not just this pair, it’s THREE other pairs I bought in different colors. I currently wear the primeblue editions (previous all black version) instead of these since they fit better. Maybe I’ll try stretching these out or something. I’ll have to go to a store and try a half size up and see if that fixes it. If they don’t I’m going to be really sad since I wear Adidas shoes every day. I might have to find a different brand that makes a comfortable shoe that fits.

reviews.title: BOOST OR BUST
reviews.comment: BOOST midsole, Primeknit upper - not many shoes can beat this combination of comfort and style. Pricy? Yes. Worth it? Also yes! Went with the Pride colorway (Kris Andrew Small collection), and I absolutely love the looks. Oreo Primeknit upper with a spattering of colours to match the colourful outsole. Everything about the shoe is both subtle and in-your-face at the same time. The fit is a bit small. Even compared to other shoes in the Ultraboost line, the 5.0 DNA feels quite tight on the left and right edges of your feet, as well as around the ankle. I personally went a half-size up and found the fit much more comfortable. Speaking of comfort... The BOOST midsole provides a considerable amount of bounce and cushioning. The snug, sock-like fit of the Primeknit is light and breathable. Can't recommend this shoe enough!

reviews.title: Not for hiking.
reviews.comment: Disappointed by a poor design. Had to return them. Being absolutely happy with my Terrex Swift R2 for more than two years I did not expect these to be such a failure. After first 10miles of hiking I got terribly painful pressure points where the corners of the shoe tongue touching the ankle. Had to unhook the top eyelets to keep the tongue untucked. Plus, the horizontal stitch in the back of left shoe, touching the Achilles’ tendon, somehow was too thick so it gave another very painful pressure point even through thick hiking socks.

reviews.title: Reliability concerns when on abrasive terrain.
reviews.comment: So I really wanted to like these, for the price point I was expecting something along the lines of a higher end boot that would last me years, when I put it through some light use scenarios of hikes through soft terrain like mud or dirt it did fantastic, the gore-tex kept my feet dry and normally for adidas shoes I go up half a size since I have some wide feet (the measurement machine at Red Wings said I was a 9.5 4E, so I normally buy a 10.5 or 11 from most places).

reviews.title: Materail wise 'LOW QUALITY'
reviews.comment: New style and comfortable to my feet.But it would be perfect if the tongue of the shoes has embbeded the name of ADIDAS with ORANGE COLOR. Also at the back of holding strap would be nice if it is ORANGE COLOR.

Additional forefoot studs on the lightweight outsole of these adidas soccer cleats ensure rapid reactions on firm ground. Up top, the soft, coated textile upper includes a supportive flat-knit collar and rigid TPU external heel lock to keep you strapped in for every cut and sprint.

reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in the quality
reviews.comment: Purchased these shoes for my daughter who plays high school soccer. Bought them July 22, she wore them for pre-season practices. By her fist game, August 20th, the sole separated from the top of the shoe! She had to tape shoe together until we could get back to the store to purchase a different pair. This is SUCH A DISAPPOINMENT!! She loves adidas and has only worn adidas since she started playing at 5. We never had this issue with this brand before these shoes. Now reading other reviews, it seems as if this is a common problem. I know that these are not the most expensive model to buy, but barely a month of use is just sub par.

Mitchell's Spida logo and signature graphics provide the finishing touch.

reviews.title: LOVE the flower and butterfly color hmm…
reviews.comment: Really am TORN on these sneakers! They are so comfortable!!! I was excited to see something that didn’t make me look like a boy. LOVE all the details that went into them. The problem is with the laces set so wide it makes my women’s size 10 look even bigger! They are so comfortable from trying them on. But they kind of look like if Hello Kitty and Barbie had a LOVE child. But like I said I am torn! James Harden your in PHL now lets see a championship and can we PLEASE get similar pattern LOVE THE JH VI and the details on the shoes. But I look ridiculous! But Comfortable. TORN on to keep or return.

reviews.name: GidTheComebackKid
reviews.title: I love the unique lacing system and interior pads.
reviews.comment: This is a very unique shoe. They took some risks and had some fun with it. I love the lacing system, interior padding, and ankle supports. My only drawbacks on this product is that it is a just a little more stiff of a basketball shoe, and I would enjoy more variety of color scheme. This shoe has a cool look, and I’ve never experienced any soreness or pain when playing. Durability seems great so far, and I love the security of the shoes overall.

reviews.name: Papabear
reviews.title: It feels built for people who like a 3pt shootint
reviews.comment: Decided to get the milkman 6's and realized these are built for hoopers who like to pull up and shoot 3's like Harden. Max comfort with the foam at the bottom but not built for quickness or explosive players who like a tight fit around their feet to get in and out of situations. When I got them they didn't look as good as they did in the pictures. Good in theory, messy in practice

reviews.name: Matt91
reviews.title: Very comfortable, but poor quality.
reviews.comment: I bought these slides about two weeks ago to use for work. We have a clean-shoe policy since COVID in any of our common areas, so I chose these to use in the main areas of the firehouse (so that our work boots aren't tracking throughout the station). I've worn these for four days but unfortunately they've already begun to show significant wear and tear, and I am not sure if this is normal or if I happened to get a defective set. They're very comfortable, honestly the most comfortable ones I've ever owned. I wanted to buy a second pair, but I'm hesitant to do so based on how this pair has worn already.

reviews.name: philipkobe2018
reviews.title: No happy with these
reviews.comment: After roughly 10 wears, my left slide completely broke. Although the slides are comfortable, they broke in little less than a week. I tried supergluing it together, however there was no luck. It would only be fair if I was issued a full refund, as the quality is absolutely horrid. I didn't pay roughly $50 to use the sliders only 10 times.
